name: .VYF File Extension
summary: Learn about .VYF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Proprietary audio file format used by Samsung digital voice recorders, such as the Samsung YV-120; optimized for vocal recordings; typically named "V001.VYF," "V002.VYF," "V003.VYF," etc.

content: NOTE: VYF files can be converted to a more compatible .WAV format using Samsung's Voice Manger software. Voice Manager can be installed from the CD included with Samsung voice recorder devices.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
